version_description: Minor bug fixes.
Minor bug fixes.

New Features

We’re excited to announce these highly-anticipated features:
• Completely redesigned application
• Clean, easy-to-use user interface
• Smoother transitions and clear steps to complete a money transfer
• Improved functionality of the Price Calculator
• Comprehensive user profiles creating a personalized experience
• Better location data to find the closest payout and send locations
• Revamped cash payment process
• Easily upload payment information with photos
• Improved transfer tracking details
• Faster repeat transfers
• NEW reverse calculator functionality
• Plus, more to come

New Features

We’re excited to announce these highly-anticipated features:
• Completely redesigned application
• Clean, easy-to-use user interface
• Smoother transitions and clear steps to complete a money transfer
• Improved functionality of the Price Calculator
• Comprehensive user profiles creating a personalized experience
• Better location data to find the closest payout and send locations
• Revamped cash payment process
• Easily upload payment information with photos
• Improved transfer tracking details
• Faster repeat transfers
• NEW reverse calculator functionality
• Plus, more to come

Experience the difference of these new features: security improvements, additional Track a Transfer functionality, bug fixes, and our Canada app launch. Ria is committed to providing an outstanding customer experience. We appreciate your feedback and have made changes to better serve you. Thanks for sending with Ria!

Experience the difference of these new features: security improvements, additional Track a Transfer functionality, bug fixes, and our Canada app launch. Ria is committed to providing an outstanding customer experience. We appreciate your feedback and have made changes to better serve you. Thanks for sending with Ria!

Thanks for using Ria
New features include:
A refreshed, more intuitive design
Instant bank verification, so you can use your bank account to send money immediately.
